name: Pangolin Newt Client
short_desc: Pangolin Newt client to connect your site (machine) to your Pangolin network.
author: C
description: Newt is a fully user space WireGuard tunnel client and TCP/UDP proxy, designed to securely expose private resources controlled by Pangolin. By using Newt, you don't need to manage complex WireGuard tunnels and NATing.

form_fields.label: Pangolin endpoint URL
form_fields.hint: Grab the Pangolin endpoint URL from the page as your setup your site.

form_fields.label: Newt ID
form_fields.hint: Grab the Newt ID from the page as your setup your site.

form_fields.label: Newt Secret
form_fields.hint: Grab the Newt Secret from the page as your setup your site.
